website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for the budged-minded. You won't find a duffel bag that offers more space and features for a lower price.
pros: A spacious bag that collapses and folds for convenient storage
We love that it is available in seven bright colors
cons: Doesn't have multiple pockets like other duffel bags we tested, but offers a lot of carrying space for the price

customer_reviews.title: Broke Quick, Company Replaced It
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke during the 3rd use. It wasn't overstuffed, the zipper just slid off the end. Up to that point, I'd enjoyed the bag, so I was quite disappointed. I contacted the company and they sent me another, informing me the bag is under warranty for 2 years from date of purchase. Hoping I just had a lemon the first time around!
customer_reviews.author: KristyQ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect extra bag for the money.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great bag! It's super thin and light and appears sturdy packed totally full. I think I'll Saran Wrap it at the airport before I check it. They have those machines for extra protection. I will say it isn't as big as I had imagined based on the man holding it in the product photo. I need it for bringing donations to Central America and I'm trying to save $. Bottle on top of bag for scale. I like how I don't have to ditch my bag on the way home, I can pack it inside itself and then inside the only bag I will bring home. I got two!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I did not like that the material is see through
customer_reviews.text: The size is large, but I did not like that the material is see through, especially the light grey area. I know it's supposed to be lightweight, but not so that you could see items in the bag. Also it literally has the words printed on the side "Pack me into this pocket". To me that's weird to have that printed on the outside of the bag so everyone can see. I'm not super picky but this was returned. Not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SIMPLE BAG and it takes up no room when not using it!
customer_reviews.text: This bag rocks. We were visiting family to introduce our newborn and realized we hadn't yet gotten a travel bag for him (the newborn) yet. Sad as it might be that a newborn needs a big duffel (those diapers and tons of extra outfits to outwit poo explosions make a minimalist cringe), this thing was just what we needed. The good thing is that, amidst all the things that babies cause you to anxiously accumulate, this bag takes up no room as it stuffs into a tiny pocket that's a part of the bag. The zipper on my overnight bag has started to break and so now I'm considering getting one of these simple, super compactible bags for me.
customer_reviews.author: VisionMaker

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag for my sons camp trip. It seems to be a decent size for a 9 years old. It has 1 small zipper on the side too.
customer_reviews.author: Ashizle

customer_reviews.title: This bag is a great way to go on vacation and save on baggage ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a great way to go on vacation and save on baggage fees. Suppose you want to travel TO your holiday with one bag, but return with two for purchases along the way. Just throw this bag in your suitcase and fill it up later. It compresses into itself in a very simple and intuitive way. The only real downside is, it has a certain chemical smell that isn't what you want to get on your clothes, and the fabric is so thin that it's likely to wear out sooner than a heavier duty duffle. Both of those are reasonable compromises given the price and convenience, however.
customer_reviews.author: Ken in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Good bag with inadequate tiny opening
customer_reviews.text: I bought 40L and 60L. If I only review 40L it would be 2 stars at most. It is nice construction, but what is dragging all of them down is opening. It is so small that you can hardly fit the item in the bag! There might be enough space in the bag itself, but if I can not squeeze the item through - the bag is useless. i wanted to put shes in. only one by one can fit through the opening. Zipper is not all the way from wall to wall
customer_reviews.author: Ilya P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, very useful
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these bags for a couple of years now, and just purchased two more. They are durable, very light, and hold an incredible amount of stuff. They are soft sided and soft bottom bags, so there isn't much structure unless they're full. But, we typically use them for shoes and clothing - so they're perfect for us. We also like the variety of colors and have ours color-coded so that we can easily locate which bag an item is in.
customer_reviews.author: Judy R.

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag for light use
customer_reviews.text: Better made than the price would indicate, but I wouldn't trust it for day-in, day-out use. It folds up very small and is a great addition to a car glove box or camping kit. The bag is lightweight and strong thanks to the rip-stop nylon, and the handles are sewn in enough that I wasn't worried about them ripping off. But the seams around the ends are single-stitched and I can see them ripping out after extended use. If you're planning your 2-month jet-setting around-the-world trip, spend the money and get something indestructible. You get more than you're paying for with this bag, but not much more. It is, after all, very inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: paradoxbomb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution ... especially if you have to pay for checking in additional bags.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution ... especially if you have to pay for checking in additional bags. 1. Leave for business or vacation and check-in one travel bag only. 2. Upon arrival, unfold the Travel Inspira that you packed in you other bag, go shopping ... & fill up your Travel Inspira with goods and gifts. 3. On your return flight you may have to pay for 2 bags to check-in ... but you your Travel Inspira has already been paid off with the savings on your outbound fee
customer_reviews.author: French Bulldog

customer_reviews.title: Practical and good quality - my go-to foldable duffel bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the second such duffel bag I bought because I liked the first one so much and sometimes want two of them. Key advantages: - The dimensions are really practical, somehow it fits everything I want to carry regardless of shape. Other foldable duffel bags somehow often are too small, too narrow, or have too small an opening. - Quality is awesome - the first one I bought has been in use for many years and looks almost like new - somehow these bags are airline proof! ;) - It's very easy to fold into a really tiny, flat package. - The screaming colours mean you immediately find your bag even in a sea of other bags.
customer_reviews.author: Baer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bag until it started splitting at the seams. I use it for a gym bag, heaviest item is my pair of shoes. Worked well, took a hiatus the end of November for knee replacement surgery, started back up a week ago and noticed a seam splitting and it just keeps getting worse. If I were not outside the return window I'd send it back. I'm now in the market for a new gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Sessions

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, Durable & Super Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I finally had the opportunity to use the Travel Inspira Duffle Bag (40L) for an overnight road trip on my motorcycle. I attached it to the passenger seat with a pair of ratchet tie-down straps. The duffle bag performed as advertised! It's spacious, super lightweight, very durable, and packs down into itself. The perfect ride companion.
customer_reviews.author: SAS

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, holds a lot but NOT waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bag to use for a trip to Disney World in order to carry a lot of different items and it worked great for the parks, used the long strap to put it around a stroller. Unfortunately it did not prove to be waterproof which was one of the main reasons that we purchased this one over the many other choices. Otherwise very happy with the product but disappointed about my clothes inside getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: M. G. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Just right for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use when I was flying to join my husband on a motorcycle vacation. I needed something that would fold down very compactly to preserve space whie travelling on the bke, and yet be sturdy enough to carry on the airplane. This was PERFECT. It is well-made, very roomy, it was allowed in the overhead compartment on the flight, even when it was quite full (on the way home). The built-in pocket worked nicely to hold small things to access during the flying-portion of the trip (phone charger, ticket paperwork, pen, etc), and the duffle was very easy to stow back into the pocket during the motorcycle-portion of the trip. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Worthitall

customer_reviews.title: Great gym bag!,
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality - folds up so tiny! Put my gym clothes in it everyday and after work I,change n toss my boots or heels in it my big ass coat. . Its very durable n I got the small one. Can't go wrong toss into my ar, into the locker. Beat this thing up. Its pretty in pink!,
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good lightweight bag for not so heavy duty hauling...
customer_reviews.text: A bit more flimsy than I'd thought it would be but it does the job. Seems made well. Very lightweight. I wouldn't expect it to hold up to carrying very heavy things for long treks in the mountains or anything but it holds my son's baseball helmet and cleats just fine.
customer_reviews.author: KCJC

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty good for the price. I’ve traveled a lot and even mover across country two times using there’s bags. They store easier than a grocery Tote. They are pretty durable. I have yet to have these bags rip on me. I’ve had them for three or so years and they are still going strong. They are really good for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. I absolutely loved this bag when I got it because it was simple, packaged in the cutest way, and very versatile. I went to pull the zipper closed the way I do everyday and it just came right off! Not only did it come off, but it fell off at the end of the bag, so all of my contents were trapped inside! I so wish I could give this a higher rating because I did love it when I got it, but now I'll need another bag! :(
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great price folds very small great as a extra bag
customer_reviews.text: This duffle is great. I bought a few for my family and my son liked he could keep it compact folded in his truck. It holds a lot of clothes and folds up to a little bag into itself. Great to have in your suitcase if you needed an extra bag. The nylon is sturdy but I wouldn’t get any sharp edges in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: The bag is large and very lightweight. I use it to go to the gym and i can fit everything in it easily. The materials and finishing is sturdy. It is also somewhat water resistant so that it does not get wet in the rain. I would recommend this also for air travel as a carry-on bag.
customer_reviews.author: Agnese

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I’m fostering 4 kids for over a year now they came with nothing so I needed something for them for travel these work great and not too expensive got 1 color for each kid.
customer_reviews.author: SportyTracy

customer_reviews.title: Survived heavy usage
customer_reviews.text: Use this duffle bag during the 4 days hiking in extreme hot weather in thailand. This duffle bag has a great capacity (i ordered the largest size) I have around 7kgs (approx. 15 lbs or more) on it for 4 days. No rip at all. The straps hold up well. I am quite surprised. It is thin enough to fold into small size and put in the luggage which helps to save space. The bag was scraped by the branches or ground many times during hiking. Still hold up fine. I would buy it again. I will use it for the coming Japan trip.
customer_reviews.author: RY

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Just received this bag. My daughter loves it. It is a LOT larger than I thought it would be ... which isn't a bad thing. Can't really say much more about this since I just opened it. Will work perfect for her sports bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: To weak for the size.
customer_reviews.text: Very large bag, good for weekends worth of clothing, but very thin and cheap material wont last long with rugged or rough use. don't expect it to keep any water out though, and the slightest sharp object will poke right through it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Stelly

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it'd be bigger and have more compartments. I still use it because I threw away my old broken one when I bought this one, but I don't love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Osterman

customer_reviews.title: Great gym bag! Especially good when locker space is scarce! It folds into a small pouch. Unfolded, it holds everything!
customer_reviews.text: What a great duffle! It folds into a small pouch. Unfolded, it holds everything! It is roomy to the max! I would be hesitant to use it for airline luggage, but I am hesitant to get near airports in general. Great gym bag! Especially good when locker space is scarce! It seems well-constructed and has shown no signs of wear so far.
customer_reviews.author: dutchw48Top Contributor: Drawing

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter to take to summer camp. It was perfect. Not too big and not too small. Washed easily
customer_reviews.author: Christina Wagner

customer_reviews.title: The bag does everything you want it to except last
customer_reviews.text: It worked kind of fine for about 4 months then it ripped dramatically where the strap was. The zipper stopped zipping about a month in but after enough effort would zip. I wasn't even using it a lot. I flew twice and the zipper gave. The strap gave the third time I flew with it. Save yourself the trouble and buy something higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: BOUGHT THIS FOR A TRIP, TRYING TO BE MINIMAL
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS FOR A TRIP, I WAS TRYING TO BE MINIMAL IN MY LUGGAGE. I STUFFED IT TILL THE SEAMS PULLED, AND USED THE CARRY HANDLES LIKE BACKPACK STRAPS, AND IT HELD UP LIKE A CHAMP. VERY NICE AND WILL DEFINITELY CONTINUE TO USE.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Homan

customer_reviews.title: Super light weight
customer_reviews.text: I lovvvve this bag - It is soooo light weight. I got a pink one for my daughter and blue for my son and I am obsessed how beautiful these bags are - in love with the material and colors - I will definitely buy another one for me and my husband. So cute!
customer_reviews.author: Dorota E. Kopacz

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is pretty sweet. I bought for $9, so it certainly beats expectations so far. I use it for the gym, so the side pocket is really nice for keys, deodorant, etc. Pretty light, seems like decent material. I'll update this review if it breaks within a year or so. The little pocket it folds into is quite small, so if you plan on using this for travel in which you expect to bring things back, I think it would work really well.
customer_reviews.author: J.K. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great Duffel Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this as it is a Christmas gift for my grandson, however I can say that it is huge, and very well made. Also his favorite color right now. It will be just what he needs for his sports equipment, or whatever he chooses. I am so happy I purchased it. I cannot wait till he opens it....there may be a surprise in there as well!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Cordy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color of this bag. It matches what I saw online (blue). There is no structure to the bag and no protective layers--its just a thin layer of nylon... and I was disappointed in that, so I gave it 4 stars. However, a 40L size it sufficient size for overnight or gym essentials. I would consider buying again. I do love that it can folded up into the small pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Spring for the 60L..
customer_reviews.text: Ok, just so you all know, the pictured item is definitely the 60L option. The 40L is QUITE small for what I was intending. I was hoping to fit a massive amount of basic clothes or shoes in it, bit looks like I'm gonna hafta keep it light. For size estimation's sake, I'd Google another duffle bag you're tangibly familiar with, and compare the dimensions. Material is great though, and handles and straps are of great quality. The blue colored 40L size I ordered came with the handle/straps grip.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Good duffle bag. Not the strongest bag out there. I wouldn't trust it with a lot of weight. But for typical gym stuff it should be ok. I haven't had it too long but I think durability will be average at best. I got the green one and really like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Titanium

customer_reviews.title: great for commuting
customer_reviews.text: this is a great bag for using while commuting, and going to the gym.if you're taking a carry-on with you, but also need a lightweight gym-bag, then this is the product for you. i pack this in my carry-on, then use this while going to/ from the office or hotel. the bag can fit my gym shoes, work clothes, and my camping towel.
customer_reviews.author: Basketball player

customer_reviews.title: nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: The bag was bigger than expected. It came all nicely packaged in the smallest size for easy traveling. I Dont know if I would be able to get it back into the small pocket it came in. I use this as my gym bag, it easily fit my shoes, workout clothes, earbuds, and notepad. I will use this bag when I travel for extra items that may not fit in my bag on the way home. I've used in my the bag for about 2 weeks and it seems like it will hold up OK for what I'm using it for.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Compact/Lite/Big
customer_reviews.text: Really happy I found this. Going on a trip and may need an extra bag for the return but didnt want to wear an empty backpack. On my trip I may be buying to pairs of shoes and wanted to take them home with the boxes. When this arrived i tested it and 2 shoe boxes def fit in this bag so I am happy. The material is tent like and seems weak but it will serve its purchased purpose.
customer_reviews.author: ZACKnSCREECHIN

customer_reviews.title: Not eligible for return...what?!  Not satisfied, but I can’t return it?
customer_reviews.text: The photo looks more hardy than actual item. The bag is too thin for travel usage. Its even thinner that a grocery brand bag. And I found that the zipper is not as sturdy...its slipping. I am so upset that its “Not Eligible For Return”. Beware of this.
customer_reviews.author: Joy BayleAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these now and they’re great. We go on lots of road trips and camping trips and these bags are perfect. Our first one has held up well so I just bought another. It would not be comfortable to carry through the airport if it was full, but they’re easy to pack in a car or tent.
customer_reviews.author: Strong5

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but tough little travel duffel bag
customer_reviews.text: my checked, roller wheel luggage got ripped apart in the Beijing airport. I had two of these duffel bags and put one inside the other, filled it with clothes and checked it on the way home. Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene K.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot bigger than I thought I got it for my 6yr old and it's honestly too big so I carry it for us, great quality tho. We do love the bag and the color.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky N.

customer_reviews.title: SO lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I love these sooo much - also got a pink one. the colors are amazing .I just wishing they would add a larger size as these are perfect for my kids but would love a bigger one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Dorota E. Kopacz

customer_reviews.title: Highly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It is true to size and to color. The material can feel flimsy but this bag can take A LOT!!! I kept on sliding stuff inside even if I wasn't sure it will get in or the zip will hold, but it did
customer_reviews.author: paola kamga

customer_reviews.title: ... duffle bags for a recent camping trip and we loved them. We were able to pack the kids ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought 7 of these duffle bags for a recent camping trip and we loved them. We were able to pack the kids clothes in them, towels were in one bag and swimming suits and gear in another. They were lightweight, compact, durable and dried easily and quickly. Great for our trip and now that we are home, we packed them away and they don't take up a ton of space in our home. The only inconvenience was that the opening was a little small, but we easily worked around that for all the other great factors.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: perfect extra bag
customer_reviews.text: Great for packing away extra clothes or to take on a trip where you need it one way and not the other (scrunches up small after use).
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Lewis Kulzer

customer_reviews.title: Very Thin
customer_reviews.text: Very thin bag. Came very wrinkled. I’m not sure if it will be very durable or hold up for long, but we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag - Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered the 40L size, but it wasn't quite large enough. The return was easy and the follow-up from the company was wonderful. The 60L is perfect - we packed a week's worth of kids clothes and shoes into it for a road trip and really appreciated the lightweight, packable material. The zippers and straps worked well and overall the bag seems like it will hold up. The kids liked the color options and carried them happily on their own. Bonus!!
customer_reviews.author: 6cousins

customer_reviews.title: Handy, Bare Bones
customer_reviews.text: I use this for trips to my YMCA pool. The bag could use a compartment flap or a better zippered pocket. Fine, but 'barebones.'
customer_reviews.author: Boitchik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for travel. I can't tell you how many times I travel to someplace and come back with more than I went there with. This bag is perfect for those situations.
customer_reviews.author: V. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bag I bought. One in royal and one in pink. Be VERY gentle with the zipper. I had to return the royal bc the zipper snapped off. They replaced it immediately. Good follow up. Good choice of colors and the price is good for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: joel Rauch

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. This just arrived today
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This just arrived today. It folds up extremely small, which I love because my house is small and I have a limited amount of space to store things like this. I will update my review if I run into any problems after using it on a few trips.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mischo

customer_reviews.title: it's great if you're going a weekend trip and only want ...
customer_reviews.text: It was too flimsy for me, no real structure but it that makes sense because it can be folded up in the tiny bag. it's great if you're going a weekend trip and only want to take one bag. But not for me, I ended up returning it. But if you are going to travel and want a light light this is the bag for you!
customer_reviews.author: S. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great But Not Perfect Might Be My Descript
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight and collapse is very small. Exactly what you would expect from the product description. I like the color, I think I would like it better if it had a little bit more body in the fabrics , but not much The fabric is strong but looks wrinkled perhaps that will go away with time. I may buy more of them later. The price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey D Boozer

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag has been my best gym bag in a long time. I took it on vacation with me last month and it folded down to nothing. It's very roomy, holds all my gym gear, change of clothes and notebook. So far it's standing up to my day to day use (Stuffing things in it, tossing in my car) without showing any wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Milk

customer_reviews.title: planning to use it for gym and for traveling
customer_reviews.text: just bought it yesterday,also a water bottle,but crystal and devon-they didn't want gym bags and water bottles,i was gonna buy it them,ended up with one gym bag and one water bottle,for me 5 stars,crystal and devon-1 to 2 stars,they don't like it,but i do
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McAlpin

customer_reviews.title: Good swim bags at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I needed gym bags for kids to take swimming. These are a good value with bright colors the kids liked. The light weight nylon will dry quickly between use and the shoulder strap is handy for hands free carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Terese Rowe

customer_reviews.title: It is light and the quality is great! I will be buying more
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughters to pack for a Disney World trip with her grandmother. One pink, one blue. It fit a week+ worth of clothes, much more than I thought it would! It is light and the quality is great! I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyne Penny

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars because the bag is fantastic - it holds A TON
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because the bag is fantastic - it holds A TON, and the fact that it can be stored in a fold up pouch is super convenient - the only downside is the material isn't the best quality. If you're looking for a functional, no frills weekender bag at a great price, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Cooper

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for the price. I was worried it would not be very well constructed, but it holds up just fine. The fabric is relatively durable and the seams have held up so far. It's nothing fancy and maybe not bomb-proof, but for the price I doubt you could beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Springsteen

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Initially I did not think it would ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Initially I did not think it would be big enough for what I intended to use it for (laundry) and considered returning it. Decided to give it a try bringing a weekend's worth of laundry back and forth from my apartment to my parent's house (classic) and it has worked perfectly. I also used it as a possible additional bag in case I need more room to bring items purchased on vacation home, which is this bag's REAL beauty. It effing folds up into this tiny thing that you can easily squeeze into a suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Was worried it's fragile but wow Snowboarding gear (pantsx2 gloves×3gpggles×2 riding bag×1 ) And a while lot of extra room Also is edition it for over nights. Going to use it for travel at the end of may for a week I have a good feeling about this. I'll update if life fails Also the grip doesn't come off the 2 handles do when you put the strap on its just the strap
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and holds many items
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and holds many items. Folds into a compact pouch, although I doubt I would need to do that now it is in use. It is not heavy material, so putting anything sharp or weighty in it would eventually rip it, but for my purposes as a gym bag, it will work well. I put a full size yoga mat, three different sized micro-fiber towels, a swim cap and suit in it with plenty of room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: mab

customer_reviews.title: Great carry on food showed items
customer_reviews.text: Bought as way to put 2 small booster seats in overhead bin vs renting them from hertz. Large size fit fine in overhead of 757 which is pretty standard size for single aisle aircraft and would have been even easier in larger 777 center or 747 outer bins. Plus there's plenty of space in bag left to stick other random, non fragile items like clothes and shoes since bag offers no padding.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: This bag itself is fantastic and worked wonderfully as a second bag for my ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag itself is fantastic and worked wonderfully as a second bag for my recent trip to Europe but I'm disappointed that the hot pink color dulled when I washed it in the washing machine. I didn't even wash it with anything else which is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: I really like how light and portable this is
customer_reviews.text: I really like how light and portable this is. It fold itself into a size of a small postcard. I always carry it with me or I toss it in my hiking backpack. Highly recommend this and I am planning to order more later on. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: qdv206

customer_reviews.title: seems great
customer_reviews.text: it seems very light, but it hasn't torn or anything yet. Working as intended and easy to store in itself.
customer_reviews.author: EmilytheStrange

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly durable and incredibly light-weight
customer_reviews.text: The 60L is kinda huge. It feels very flimsy and thin, but I have had no problems with the quality. I filled it full of clothes, shoes and hair-styling & makeup products and it is holding up just fine. **Extra Note - The pictures don't show it, but there is an extra strap/handle sewn between the short handles across the body of the bag that really help carrying it when it is super full.
customer_reviews.author: Fickle Lady

customer_reviews.title: Super light and portable
customer_reviews.text: The material is durable. The bag packs down really small it id great for taking in a trip if you will need more space.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna E.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy gym bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made, sturdy gym bag. Good size for taking a workout clothes to the gym. Well made and has held-up well. One large compartment plus a small zipper pocket for deodorant, hair brush, etc. I have had cheaper bags that ripped easily, and I appreciate that this one is better quality and seems like it will last a while!
customer_reviews.author: New Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I got one and used it on 3 vacations and then he zipper tore... I ordered the 60 L it was very roomy and just kept expanding s I added stuff... it is light weight and durable material no holes... I reordered this becuase it's so cheap fixing the old zipper would cost more. But I do love this bag for staycations and close getaways.
customer_reviews.author: Chanie

customer_reviews.title: Awful Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these bags to use as carry-ons. The bags are very light. I cannot comment on their durability just yet, but will update. Each bag comes with a discount code for your next purchase. However, the code does not work. I emailed customer service but never received a reply.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea DC

customer_reviews.title: Great economy duffel bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 5 of these to decorate and donate to children in the foster care system. They worked very well! It's better than what you would expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hfamily

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. I like it for my travel needs. I think it’s a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JamieLT

customer_reviews.title: A big bag in a little package
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Light weight ready to pack holds more than i thought it would. I was also able to add a vinyl customization to it so everyone knows it’s mine
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Manchester

customer_reviews.title: Good so far.
customer_reviews.text: Good bag. I didn't test to see if it is really waterproof, but I am guessing it is more water resistant. I bought this for kayaking, so I can carry gear outside the kayak when needed. It works great for that purpose. I have used it for general travel, but without anything giving it structure, it really doesn't work well unless your items are big and light.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: just what I wanted, super light and packable.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lightweight bag that can be folded in a larger suitcase as an extra bag or to put my toiletries in for easy transport to the bathroom in a hotel (I have several smaller containers for makeup, soaps etc). This is perfect, it's not super rugged, but I don't need that. It is light as a feather and roomy.
customer_reviews.author: lup247

customer_reviews.title: we like it! Bought primarily as a shoe carrying bag ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, we like it! Bought primarily as a shoe carrying bag so the fold up aspect hasn't been important--it looks like it could be a challenge to get it back into the attached pouch, but the design is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: great lightweight and flexible gym bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a very thin lightweight duffel bag, which is exactly what I need, but it may or may not be what you need! I have a very small gym locker, and I need to smash everything in the locker, so lightweight and flexible works well for my purposes. It appears to be reasonable strong given how lightweight it is. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: msg

customer_reviews.title: Great travel companion
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fold up as flat or well as a different one I had. Still, a bag like this can be indispensable when traveling. I always take it with me even though I don't always need it, but when I do, it is invaluable. Still looking for one I'll like better but meanwhile this is just great and better than any others similar to it I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Terpsichore

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Love the style the color the size ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Love the style the color the size the quality the weight. Its cute as an everyday bag too if not packed all the way.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It's incredibly lightweight, but very strong. I use it as my gym bag. Folds up easy if you need it, and holds a lot of things. I'm not sure you want to be carrying bricks in it, but should hold up with normal items. Perfect for overnight stays, gym, going to the cabin, beach or whatever. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Daggit

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for this gym bag to arrive. However, the complany folded it up, so when I unfolded it the bag was covered in wrinkles. You can’t iron this material, so it looks hideous. The bag is see through and is made from cheap material. I’ll be buying another gym bag from another company. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Nicollette

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Very thin material. Ok for a quick trip but I wouldn’t trust it to travel.
customer_reviews.author: CheshyreCat

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and reusable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a hospital bag. It was huge, fit everything I needed without adding weight. Easy to carry and washed well. When we were done with it, it was super easy to fold back into a pouch for storage.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: What a cool bag! It definitely comes in and out of ...
customer_reviews.text: What a cool bag! It definitely comes in and out of the carrying bag really easily and has all the right attachments. The material is really think so I'm hoping it holds up but I'm really happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Really good, in fact I’ve bought a couple more as gifts
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Big size
customer_reviews.text: I like how much fits in it. I took 5 days worth plus gifts in it
customer_reviews.author: Nina Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love my bag, it is so handy for those weekend trips so that you don't have to use a bulky suitcase. Super easy to fold up and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Malinoski

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Used this for our dirty clothes return from 2 weeks in Japan. Worked flawlessly. We actually wrapped the whole bag in plastic wrap just in case for the return flight. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: dwlyles

customer_reviews.title: Material is thin
customer_reviews.text: Very thin material. Bag is ok... nice size but wouldn't buy it again. It has no structure to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lovern

customer_reviews.title: Zipper breaks.
customer_reviews.text: It already broke. The zipper is too flimsy. I have two of these with broken zippers :/
customer_reviews.author: Aman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color, the compactness, and the amount of weight it carried.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Overseas Travel
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely PERFECT collapsible, featherweight duffle bag for overseas travel. Stow them in your luggage on the way over, then they can be used for grocery/market shopping while you travel. When you return, just put your gifts inside. Very sturdy, attractive, and useful. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: InOrlando

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and I love the way it folds up. However, before purchasing, consider your needs and if structure is important, as this bag has no shape and it may not hold certain items well. But it is a good bag to own and it seems sturdy in my experience thus far.
customer_reviews.author: anon1

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality for the price. Arrived on time. Feels durable and waterproof. The teal color is exactly what I expected. The smaller size is perfect for use as a gym bag and an additional carry on option if my suitcase is overweight. Packaging was simple but nice. This would make a great gift for a college student, a traveler, or your great aunt that always brings back too many souvenirs. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Flagler

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a low price
customer_reviews.text: Thin material color more blue green than blue (which I ordered). Big interior, I'll use for my gym bag. Nice additional strap and I like the side storage pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Vibrant color
customer_reviews.text: Love the collapsible bags. Great for traveling. And they repel water too so you can be sure whatever is inside wont be wet.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Walker

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to fold back down and stuff into the attached ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of theses duffels. They are easy to fold back down and stuff into the attached pouch. They seem well made and have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: K M

product_meta.title: travel inspira Duffel Bag For Women & Men - Foldable lightweight Duffle For Luggage Gym Sports
product_meta.description:
★ Small Size for easy storage, but Large Capacity for mass stuff 


Specification: 

- MATERIAL: Nylon 
- TYPE: Shoulder Bag / Handbag 
- COLOR: Black, Green, Blue, Purple, Rose Red 
- MULTI-PURPOSE：Travel Duffle Bag for Gym, Sports duffle bag , Travel foldable bag ,short Tip,shopping bag or Emergencies 


Product Dimensions: 

40L: 17.94" x 10.53" x 11.31" (46*27*29cm) 

60L: 22.23" x 11.31" x 12.09" (57*29*31cm) 

85L: 11 x 15 x 27 inches (28 x 38 x 68.5 cm) 


Does a knapsack or a luggage suit for outdoor activities? 

We doubt it. A lightweight and foldable duffel bag, which is made of durable and water resistant ripstop fabric, must be a great helper for you and your family on the vacation! 

Unlike the thick and solid handbag and backpack, the foldable duffel can be easily bended and the edge can be pressed easily but still equipped with durable laminate material. Just few steps the bag will be fold down neatly into the carry pouch and stay in place. 

What's more, this bulky bag has the spacious space for around in-flight, or to be transported up a mountain, definitely being an ideal company with 3 choice: 40,60,85 liter volume. ★ What are you waiting for? Come and get your burly duffel bag right now ! ★
feature_bullets: Material: The foldable Travel Bag is made from unique ripstop nylon fabric, ultra lightweight,durable and water resistant.It weighs only 1.2 pounds .

Easy Carry :This duffle can be fast folded into itself with a compact size Unfold size: 40L: 17.94" x 10.53" x 11.31" (46*27*29cm) 60L: 22.23" x 11.31" x 12.09" (57*29*31cm) Fold size: 40L 7.8" x 1.8" x5.7" 60L 7.8" x 2" x 6.7" ,perfect to bring along in suitcase for extra storage or marketing or laundry when on a trip.

EASY TRANSPORT: A removable & adjustable shoulder strap and two handle straps for carrying comfort and versatility. A strap allows bag to slide over the luggage upright handle tube for Easy Transport without Packable.

MULTI-PURPORSE USE: Foldable and collapsible design makes it work great for travel and gym, you can use it as a gym bag, a carry on bag, a travel bag or weekender bag, it works for everything and anything.
We will donate one foldable bag while every cumulative sell ten for Luggage of Love Charity.
